title: How tanks see themselves
body:

How {{champion:48}} sees them 

http://pleated-jeans.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/nowhyporque.gif


Been playing this guy a bunch he's just so good

replies.body: shhh shhh shh, people are gonna find out he's op if you bring him up.
Probably better that way, so he can get proper nerfs otherwise he'll get gutted
thats some nice stats there, would be a shame if someone stole them...
